information: We are your partner for all kinds of marking systems. From classic office stamps through mechanical printing systems to mobile ink-jet printing systems, we provide a wide range of products. As a market leader in the manufacture of special rubber types in the fields of manual and mechanical industrial marking, we service a distinguished client base all around the world. When looking for a suitable marking solution for different applications, our top priority is personalised advice and a solution-oriented approach. All our products are subject to comprehensive quality checks right up to delivery. Furthermore, punctual delivery and the shortest possible production times – even for individual special products – are a matter of course for us. In addition to the different marking devices, our portfolio also includes consumables such as marking dyes and ink pads (also in special sizes).
